content:
You can deploy .NET Framework applicaton with Docker, using Windows Containers. You can learn the requirements for using Windows Containers and how to Get Started with Docker for Windows.

You can begin by running a console application with Docker. For running web applications in Docker, you can read ASP.NET MVC applications in Docker.
